attributes.action: Delay the National lockdown start date by just one week
attributes.additional_details: Because shutting down large parts of the country where the numbers of covid deaths and hospitalisation are insignificant is complete madness
attributes.background:
To test independently and challenge the data relied on by Government to make national lockdown decision which so many ‘scientists’ are challenging as significantly overstated; and

4 to allow proper debate of non-covid health, economic consequences and civil unrest/disobedience

rejection.details:
I'm sorry we didn't get to your petition before the current lockdown started, but you might like to sign some of the following petitions:

Do not implement a second national lockdown or other restrictions this winter: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549862

Fund & provide services to allow the vulnerable to shield & re-open the economy: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552023

Lift local lockdowns and Covid-19 restrictions in England: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551469

Referendum on current restrictions and any further lockdowns: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551539

Repeal second National Lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557045
